lead_paragraph: HOROWYTZ--Harold, passed away peacefully on May 15, 2016 after a wonderful life filled with the joy of family. His acumen in the food business was always evident at Zabar's where he worked for over 40 years. Beloved husband of Vera for 65 inseparable years. Treasured and devoted father of Mark (Rae Gladstein), Roni (Jim Ackerman) and Sheri (Craig Tendler). Cherished and adored grandfather of Josh (Maria), Adam, Matt (Carol), Alicia, Daniel, Josh, Helena (Sam) and Amanda and great- grandfather of Jonathan, Marissa, and London. He will be missed by those whose lives he enriched with his genuine kindness and larger than life spirit. Funeral services at 1pm, May 17th, Robert Schoem Memorial Chapel, Paramus, NJ. Shiva will be observed Tuesday - Monday at 867 Columbus Drive, Teaneck, NJ. In lieu of flowers, the family would be grateful for any donation made in Harold's memory to: Temple B'nai Sholem, New Bern, NC. 1/3
